scripts.update-lang-id: find packages -type f -name "*.js" -o -name "*.jsx" -o -name "*.ts" -o -name "*.tsx" -o -name "*.json" -o -name "*.md" -o -name "*.html" | xargs grep -l "0165" | xargs sed -i '' 's/0165/0166/g'
scripts.build: npm run -w packages/app build; npm run -w packages/api build
scripts.lint: npm run -w packages/api lint; npm run -w packages/app lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run -w packages/api lint:fix; npm run -w packages/app lint:fix
